IORWLockAlloc FunctionIORWLockAllocDriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOSstruct IORWLock * IORWLockAlloc();Return ValuePointer to the allocated lock, or zero on failure.

Allocates and initializes a read/write lock.

# IORWLockAlloc | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IORWLockAlloc ](/documentation/driverkit/iorwlockalloc)

-  IORWLockAlloc 

Function# IORWLockAlloc

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
struct IORWLock * IORWLockAlloc();
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/driverkit/iorwlockalloc#return-value)

Pointer to the allocated lock, or zero on failure.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iorwlockalloc#discussion)

Allocates and initializes a read/write lock.

Allocates and initializes a read/write lock in general purpose memory. Read/write locks provide for multiple readers, one exclusive writer.
